entities.name: quidditch field
entities.description: The location where Quidditch is played, described as being towards and having a strong wind.

entities.name: umbrellas
entities.description: Items used to protect against the rain, mentioned as being whipped out of people's hands by the wind.

entities.name: malfoy
entities.description: A student at Hogwarts, described as laughing and pointing at Harry from under an umbrella.

entities.name: crabbe
entities.description: A student at Hogwarts, mentioned alongside Malfoy and Goyle as laughing and pointing at Harry.

entities.name: goyle
entities.description: A student at Hogwarts, described as laughing and pointing at Harry from under an umbrella.

entities.name: wood
entities.description: The Quidditch coach, mentioned as trying to give a pep talk but being unable to speak due to the wind.

entities.name: snitch
entities.description: A small golden ball used in Quidditch, mentioned as being difficult for Harry to see due to the rain and wind.

relationships.description: Malfoy and Crabbe are described as laughing and pointing at Harry together, indicating a friendly relationship.
Wood is the Quidditch coach, leading the team before their match.
